On the home page you can see the current state of your activity city and view tasks scheduled for the current date, tasks with deadlines in the future, and unscheduled tasks. Checking the box next to tasks sets them as complete. Once a task is completed, a reward can be collected by clicking the button with the star. tasks can also be deleted by clicking the "X" next to them. The button with the "+" takes to the new task page where you can create a new task.

Tasks are categorized and grouped based on what goals they contribute to. When you first open the app you will be able to see one goal only named "default" to which uncategorized tasks go to. you can create your own goals by clicking the button with "+" sign and filling in a name and an optional description.
New tasks can be created from the Home page or the Scheduled page by clicking the "+" button. Tasks require a name and can have a description, scheduled date and time or deadline.

The schedule page shows a calendar with the dates with tasks or deadline marked. Clicking on those dates shows the scheduled tasks at the bottom of the calendar. You can select a date on the calendar and click the "+" button to add a task to the selected date.

Self Message page is an area for you to leave motivational messages or reflections to yourself to view later when you need them. you can view hints and ideas on what to write about at the top of the text input box.

The Activity City page is where you view and move your rewards around to form your own city. Buildings will appear at the top left corner of the screen once you collect a reward from a task. Those can be dragged and dropped. Clicking on the building shows the name of the task completed to obtain it.
